method.name: StartResolutionDialog
method.comment: Starts the resolution dialog. The user can then enable the location settings required to meet the location request requirements. This method must be called from an Activity. Raises the event: ResolutionDialogDismissed(LocationSettingsUpdated As Boolean)

method.name: GetStatusCode
method.comment: Returns the status code that describes whether the location settings meet the location request requirements.

field.name: StatusCodes
field.comment: Contains the various StatusCode constants.

field.name: SETTINGS_CHANGE_UNAVAILABLE
field.comment: Location settings do not meet the location request requirements. Location settings can't be changed to meet the location request requirements. No resolution dialog is available.

field.name: SUCCESS
field.comment: Location settings meet the location request requirements.

field.name: RESOLUTION_REQUIRED
field.comment: Location settings do not meet the location request requirements. Location settings can be changed to meet the location request requirements. A resolution dialog is available.

method.name: IsGpsPresent
method.comment: Whether GPS provider is present on the device.

method.name: IsBlePresent
method.comment: Whether BLE is present on the device.

method.name: IsNetworkLocationUsable
method.comment: Whether network location provider is enabled and usable by the app.

method.name: IsNetworkLocationPresent
method.comment: Whether network location provider is present on the device.

method.name: IsLocationPresent
method.comment: Whether location is present on the device. This method returns true when either GPS or network location provider is present.

method.name: IsGpsUsable
method.comment: Whether GPS provider is enabled and is usable by the app.

method.name: IsLocationUsable
method.comment: Whether location is enabled and is usable by the app. This method returns true when either GPS or network location provider is usable.

method.name: IsBleusable
method.comment: Whether BLE is enabled and is usable by the app.

method.name: GetLocationSettingsStates
method.comment: Returns the location settings states.

method.name: GetLocationSettingsStatus
method.comment: Returns the location settings result status.

method.name: Build
method.comment: Creates a LocationSettingsRequest.

method.name: SetNeedBle
method.comment: Sets whether the client wants BLE scan to be enabled. When this flag is set to true, if the platform supports BLE scan mode and Bluetooth is off, the dialog will prompt the user to enable BLE scan. If the platform doesn't support BLE scan mode, the dialog will prompt to enable Bluetooth.

method.name: AddLocationRequest
method.comment: Adds one LocationRequest that the client is interested in. This method can be called multiple times if required to add additional location requests.

method.name: SetAlwaysShow
method.comment: Always show the dialog, without the "Never" option to suppress future dialogs from this app. When this flag is set to true, the dialog will show up if the location settings do not satisfy the request, even if a user has previously chosen "Never". NOTE: Only use this method if your dialog is the result of an explicit user-initiated action that requires location to proceed. Cancelling this dialog should also cancel the initiated action.

method.name: SetExpirationTime
method.comment: Set the request expiration time, in millisecond since boot.

method.name: SetPriority
method.comment: Set the priority of the request.

method.name: SetFastestInterval
method.comment: Explicitly set the fastest interval for location updates, in milliseconds.

method.name: Initialize
method.comment: Initialize the LocationRequest with default parameters. Default parameters are for a block accuracy, slowly updated location.

method.name: GetNumUpdates
method.comment: Get the number of updates requested.

method.name: GetSmallestDisplacement
method.comment: Get the minimum displacement between location updates in meters. By default this is 0.

method.name: GetFastestInterval
method.comment: Get the fastest interval of this request, in milliseconds.

method.name: GetExpirationTime
method.comment: Get the request expiration time, in milliseconds since boot.

method.name: GetPriority
method.comment: Get the quality of the request.

method.name: SetSmallestDisplacement
method.comment: Set the minimum displacement between location updates in meters. By default this is 0.

method.name: GetInterval
method.comment: Get the desired interval of this request, in milliseconds.

method.name: SetInterval
method.comment: Set the desired interval for active location updates, in milliseconds.

method.name: SetExpirationDuration
method.comment: Set the duration of this request, in milliseconds.

method.name: SetNumUpdates
method.comment: Set the number of location updates.

field.name: Priority
field.comment: Contains the various priority constants.

field.name: PRIORITY_HIGH_ACCURACY
field.comment: Used with SetPriority(Int) to request the most accurate locations available.

field.name: PRIORITY_LOW_POWER
field.comment: Used with SetPriority(Int) to request "city" level accuracy.

field.name: PRIORITY_NO_POWER
field.comment: Used with SetPriority(Int) to request the best accuracy possible with zero additional power consumption.

field.name: PRIORITY_BALANCED_POWER_ACCURACY
field.comment: Used with SetPriority(Int) to request "block" level accuracy.

method.name: GetLastKnownLocation
method.comment: Returns the best most recent location currently available. Can only be called if the FusedLocationProvider is connected. The returned Location object will not be initialized if no last known location is available.

method.name: RemoveLocationUpdates
method.comment: Remove all requests for location updates.

method.name: Connect
method.comment: Attempt to connect to the Location Services. Will raise either event: ConnectionFailed(ConnectionResult1 As Int) ConnectionSuccess

method.name: Initialize
method.comment: Initialize the FusedLocationProvider object.

method.name: CheckLocationSettings
method.comment: Checks if the relevant system settings are enabled on the device to carry out the desired location requests. Raises the event: LocationSettingsChecked(LocationSettingsResult1 As LocationSettingsResult)

method.name: RequestLocationUpdates
method.comment: Request for location updates. The LocationRequest object defines the criteria for which location updates are requested.

method.name: Disconnect
method.comment: Disconnect from the Location Services.

method.name: IsConnecting
method.comment: Returns whether the FusedLocationProvider is trying to connect to the Location Services.

method.name: IsConnected
method.comment: Returns whether the FusedLocationProvider is connected to the Location Services.

field.name: ConnectionResult
field.comment: Contains the various ConnectionResult constants.

field.name: SuspendedCause
field.comment: Contains the various SuspendedCause constants.

field.name: SUCCESS
field.comment: The connection was successful.

field.name: INTERNAL_ERROR
field.comment: An internal error occurred.

field.name: RESOLUTION_REQUIRED
field.comment: Completing the connection requires some form of resolution.

field.name: SERVICE_INVALID
field.comment: The version of the Google Play services installed on this device is not authentic.

field.name: CANCELLED
field.comment: The client cancelled the connection by calling Disconnect().

field.name: INVALID_ACCOUNT
field.comment: The client attempted to connect to the service with an invalid account name specified.

field.name: DEVELOPER_ERROR
field.comment: The application is misconfigured.

field.name: SERVICE_MISSING
field.comment: Google Play services is missing on this device.

field.name: LICENSE_CHECK_FAILED
field.comment: The application is not licensed to the user. This error is not recoverable and will be treated as fatal.

field.name: NETWORK_ERROR
field.comment: A network error occurred. Retrying should resolve the problem.

field.name: SERVICE_DISABLED
field.comment: The installed version of Google Play services has been disabled on this device.

field.name: API_UNAVAILABLE
field.comment: One of the API components you attempted to connect to is not available.

field.name: SERVICE_VERSION_UPDATE_REQUIRED
field.comment: The installed version of Google Play services is out of date.

field.name: SIGN_IN_REQUIRED
field.comment: The client attempted to connect to the service but the user is not signed in.

field.name: CAUSE_NETWORK_LOST
field.comment: A connection suspended cause informing you that a peer device connection was lost.

field.name: CAUSE_SERVICE_DISCONNECTED
field.comment: A connection suspended cause informing that the service has been killed.

root.comment: The FusedLocationProvider intelligently manages the underlying location technology and gives you the best location according to your needs. https://developer.android.com/google/play-services/location.html This library depends on the Google Play Services library, android-support-v4 library and the GPS library. The GPS library is required in order to use it's Location object.
root.author: Martin Pearman
